events.comment: Change the animation according to what the player do.
events.comment2: On change l'animation en fonction de ce que fait le joueur.

events.comment: Enemies events are in another events sheet (allowing for better organization of the events):

objects.name: PlayerDetails
objects.string: You - Defend your home from the incoming monsters!

objects.name: Controls
objects.string:
Jump - Space
Shoot - Hold E
Climb down - Down Arrow Key

objects.name: SkeletonText
objects.string: Skeleton - A regular forest dweller. Slow and easily dealt with. (1HP)

objects.name: GoblinText
objects.string: Goblin - Small and fast. Keep an eye for these sneaky monsters. (1HP)

objects.name: FlyingEyeText
objects.string: Flying Eye - Be ready to jump to intercept this aerial monster. (1HP)

objects.name: MushroomText
objects.string: Mushroom - Slow but strong. These foes can take multiple hits. (2HP)

objects.name: Instructions
objects.string:
Press Backspace to go back to Main Menu

Press Enter to play again

events.comment: Dead enemies: make them fade out (and remove them when they have disappeared!)

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Allow an object to move smoothly on the X and/or Y axis following a sine wave, or an ellipsis.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: SineMovement
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Allow an object to move smoothly on the X and/or Y axis following a sine wave, or an ellipsis.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allow an object to move smoothly on the X and/or Y axis following a sine wave.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: SineMovement

propertyDescriptors.label: Amplitude of the movement on X axis (0 to deactivate)
propertyDescriptors.name: AmplitudeX

propertyDescriptors.label: Amplitude of the movement on Y axis (0 to deactivate)
propertyDescriptors.name: AmplitudeY

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: 4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Behaviors to animate Tiled Sprite objects in the background, following the camera with a parallax effect.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Parallax
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Behaviors to animate Tiled Sprite objects in the background, following the camera with a parallax effect.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Move the image of a Tiled Sprite to follow the camera horizontally with a parallax effect. After adding this to an object, put the object on a layer that is not moving, behind the layer that is followed (for example, a layer called "Background").
eventsBasedBehaviors.fullName: Horizontal Parallax for a Tiled Sprite
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: HorizontalTiledSpriteParallax

propertyDescriptors.label: Parallax factor (speed for the parallax, usually between 0 and 1)
propertyDescriptors.name: ParallaxFactor

propertyDescriptors.label: Layer to be followed (leave empty for the base layer)
propertyDescriptors.name: FollowedLayer

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Move the image of a Tiled Sprite to follow the camera vertically with a parallax effect. After adding this to an object, put the object on a layer that is not moving, behind the layer that is followed (for example, a layer called "Background").
eventsBasedBehaviors.fullName: Vertical Parallax for a Tiled Sprite
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: VerticalTiledSpriteParallax

propertyDescriptors.label: Parallax factor (speed for the parallax, usually between 0 and 1)
propertyDescriptors.name: ParallaxFactor

propertyDescriptors.label: Layer to be followed (leave empty for the base layer)
propertyDescriptors.name: FollowedLayer
